---
title: "Update GoogleSheet"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(pins)
library(googlesheets4)

get_involved_data_toy <- board_connect()

latest <- pin_read(get_involved_data_toy, name = "renatadiaz/getinvolvedtoy")

gs4_auth(
  cache = here::here(".secrets"),
  email = gargle::gargle_oauth_email()
)

# Retrieve existing datasheet
sheet_url <- "https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1X697V-KqTA0v26dyFbFxx8mPeKTVsBAyYJO0MkDKbkA/edit#gid=0"
previous <- read_sheet(sheet_url)

if(nrow(latest) > nrow(previous)) {
  
  write_sheet(latest, ss = sheet_url, sheet = 'Sheet1')
  
}

```
